title: Encyclopedia of the social and cultural foundations of education

Pedagogik$$QPedagogik -- uppslagsverk
Pedagogik -- sociologiska aspekter
description: Provides an introduction to the social and cultural foundations of education. This area of education reflects many of the conflicts, tensions, and forces in American society, focusing on issues such as race, gender, socioeconomic class, the impact of technology on learning, what it means to be educated, and the role of teaching and learning in a societal context.
series: Gale virtual reference library$$QGale virtual reference library
Gale virtual reference library.$$QGale virtual reference library.

abstract: Provides an introduction to the social and cultural foundations of education. This area of education reflects many of the conflicts, tensions, and forces in American society, focusing on issues such as race, gender, socioeconomic class, the impact of technology on learning, what it means to be educated, and the role of teaching and learning in a societal context.
